item.title: Pro Videographer to film workshop and edit compelling sizzle reels - Upwork
item.description:
I'm very excited to launch my new seminar series with a small event in Los Angeles.  I'm looking for an expert videographer to film the event, and edit the footage for a variety of assets, including a sizzle reel.  If it's possible for you to cover photography, that would be great as well (we can discuss further).  I'm keen to find someone with very good taste, and creative vision and judgement.  Also, it would be great to have a 2-camera set up for the most robust visuals, but this is not mandatory.

~Event Details~

- 15-30 senior marketing executives
- Me speaking and presenting, with some breakout activities
- Will be held in a small, elegant space, which I am locking in currently (~1200 - 2000 sq ft.)
- The event will be held in Los Angeles in early August (likely Sunday, 8/4 - confirming within the next few days)
- The event is likely to be held at this location (confirming in the next few days): https://www.thestorefront.com/spaces/united-states/california/los-angeles/32304-dtla-grand-loft-with-high-ceilings

~High-Level Creative Vision~

- My seminar, Executive Gravitas, is rooted in teaching executives how to be their most impressive selves, and my brand is very professional, impressive, and elegant.  I am not stuffy, though, so this should be vibrant and creative (not corporate).  I want the coverage and assets to be impressive and elegant, and exciting.
- The overall goals for the video assets are to 1) Showcase my brand in an impressive and beautiful way, 2) give viewers an idea of what an Executive Gravitas event is like (and intrigue them to attend one), and 3) create testimonials.

~Assets Sought (open for discussion - we may not edit these all at once, but my goal is to create these assets from the footage filmed)~

- Sizzle reel (longer form, 2+ minutes)
- Set of short clips for digital ads and other use (10-30sec)
- Short testimonials from select attendees (15-30sec)
- Separate footage of me describing the event (like an interview but no interviewer)

~Here are a few examples of videos from successful speakers.  Keep in mind, mine will only have footage taken at this event, there will not be other media pulled into mine (our project will source footage from a single event / filming instance)~

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ChHNTCf1jdw
- I really like the dynamic and energetic editing that convinces the viewer of his skill and credibility

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HEQxiykY4G8
- This is a good example of interview style footage woven into event footage

Hourly Range: $50.00-$125.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 21:14 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Event Photography, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Skills: Business, Event Photography, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Video Modification for Overlandats.com - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to modify our YouTube video for overlandats.com. The video has accumulated visitor data, and we need someone who can analyze the data and make appropriate modifications to improve its performance. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and data analysis. Attention to detail and a creative mindset are essential to ensure that the video effectively communicates our message. This project requires strong communication skills to collaborate with our team and incorporate the necessary changes. If you are passionate about video editing and can enhance the performance of our YouTube video, we would love to hear from you.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Data analysis
- Attention to detail
- Creativity
- Communication

item.title: Part-Time/Full-Time Video Editor (In-House/Remote Combo) - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Full-Time Videographer/Editor

Location: Phoenix, AZ (Hybrid - Home and Office)

About Us:

We are a culture and team family focused organization dedicated to producing impactful and educational video content in the precious metals and economic space. Our mission is to simplify complex financial concepts and inform our audience through timely, original videos highlighting potential threats to their wealth and financial security. We are committed to making consistent and powerful content that is accessible to everyone. We're seeking a talented, self-driven and creative videographer/editor to join our team and further our mission to protect and grow peoples wealth.

Position Overview:

You will be responsible for the full video production cycle, including planning, filming, editing, publishing, and post-production. You will regularly produce long-form content for our YouTube channel and adapt this content into engaging short-form videos for various social media platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

-Concept Development: Work closely with the marketing team to brainstorm and develop video concepts that align with our brand and objectives.
-Filming: Set up and operate cameras, lighting, and audio equipment to capture high-quality video footage.
-Editing: Edit raw footage into polished, compelling videos, incorporating graphics, effects, transitions, and sound to enhance the final product.
-Publishing: Oversee the scheduling and publishing of video content on YouTube and other social media channels.
-Post-Production: Perform color correction, audio mixing, b-roll, and other post-production tasks to ensure retention and high-quality output.
-Content Repurposing: Create short-form content from long-form videos tailored for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok.
-Brand Alignment: Ensure all video content is consistent with our brand guidelines and resonates with our target audience.
-Innovation: Contribute fresh, creative ideas for video content that engages, informs, and inspires.
-Project Management: Handle multiple video projects at once, ensuring timely delivery and maintaining high standards of quality.
-Equipment Maintenance: Keep video equipment in excellent condition and manage inventory.
-Professional Development: Stay current with industry trends, techniques, and tools to continually improve video production quality, learn and grow.

Qualifications:

-Demonstrated experience as a videographer/editor with a impressive portfolio.
-Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Cloud, Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
-Experience with motion graphics and visual effects is a bonus.
-Strong skills in lighting, composition, and audio recording.
-Ability to work both independently and collaboratively, driven, and self-motivated
-Excellent organizational and time management skills.
-High attention to detail and a creative flair or style.
-Adaptability to changing priorities and managing multiple projects simultaneously.
-Understanding of social media platforms and video content trends.
-Growth mindset and an always improving attitude
-Takes responsibility for mistakes and commits to solving problems with innovative ideas.

What We Offer:

-Competitive hourly or annual salary based on experience and previous work examples.
-A supportive, team-family culture.
-Hybrid in-office + work from home days
-Opportunities for professional growth and development.
-Access to high quality video production equipment and software.
-A collaborative and relaxing work environment.
-Contractor or Employment Options with benefits

If you are passionate about creating video content that educates and informs millions of viewers, we would love to hear from you. Join us in our mission to make complex financial information accessible and engaging, so that we can protect and grow people's wealth for decades to come.

Hourly Range: $32.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 18:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create a 2-3 Minute Crowdfunding Video - Set Fixed Fee/Estimated Delivery Timeline - Upwork
item.description:
PLEASE READ THOROUGHLY BEFORE SUBMITTING A PROPOSAL:

Project: Create a 2–3-minute creative and captivating crowdfunding video for the following:

Scaling a counseling center currently only offering telehealth as well as the purchase of a building to accommodate in-person services and other community health and wellness products and/or services.

I will pass along the following resources to support research and video creation:

- A general flow for crowdfunding videos (for reference)
- A detailed video project outline
- A sample/draft video script
- Sample stock video footage for desired direction and context
- Draft pitch deck
- Building exterior images in as-is condition, as-built architectural drawings for interior, and crude transformational drawings to get a general idea of the vision

***A nondisclosure agreement (NDA) must be fully executed before a contract is in place. Will receive this once an unofficial offer is extended.***

Video will likely include live recordings, prerecorded stock video footage/images, from-scratch video animations. These options will be appropriately used/timed to correspond with the script.

CANDIDATE PREFERENCES

MUST-HAVES:

- Motivated self-starter with an autonomous working style and comfortability working with little direction a must. Posting this project because of significant time constraints.
- Previous videography/editing experience a must.
-Video creation for crowdfunding specifically a must.
- Ability to collaborate fully remotely and integrate owner-specific segment recordings into the video a must.

NOT A DEAL-BREAKER BUT A BIG PLUS:

- Scalable start-up experience, especially within healthcare sector.
- Knowledge of scaled mental health private practice business models.
- Commercial real estate venture experience. Working knowledge of legal and logistical implications.

PLEASE SET YOUR FIXED PRICE FOR THE ENTIRE PROJECT. CAN SET MILESTONES BUT FIXED OFFERS ONLY PLEASE.

WILL ALSO ONLY CONSIDER PROPOSALS THAT INCLUDE ESTIMATED TIMELINES FOR PROJECT COMPLETION.

Please note:

ALL COPIES OF FINAL PRODUCT AND CONTENT INCLUDED THEREIN SOLELY OWNED BY SARA E. TELLER INDUSTRIES, LLC.

*ANY BRANDING INCORPORATED INTO PROJECT SUBJECT TO ADVANCED APPROVAL.

*UNAUTHORIZED DISTRIBUTION PROHIBITED. NOT FOR SALE. WRITTEN PERMISSION TO DISTRIBUTE FOR MARKETING AND/OR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES REQUIRES WRITTEN/ADVANCED APPROVAL.

Thanks for looking!
Sara

This job will be posted for exactly one week before an offer is extended. Please be patient. Offers will be reviewed during this timeframe and an offer will be extended at the end of 7 days.

item.title: Podcast audio and video editor needed for 1x/week episodes - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and self-sufficient podcast audio and video editor to join our team. Our ideal candidate is someone who can work independently with minimal guidance and has a keen eye for detail.

Native English proficiency is required to understand and comprehend the nuances of our recordings, including what to include and exclude.

Here is our YouTube channel where you can find the podcast: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHdJzcy6XBDlTv9nbh9s3Vw

Responsibilities:

1. Edit podcast episodes for audio and video, ensuring high-quality production.

2. Add graphic overlays and adapt layouts for varying numbers of participants (1-3 people)

3. Ensure seamless integration of intros, outros, and any ads or sponsorships

4. Enhance audio quality by reducing background noise, balancing levels, and improving overall sound

5. Sync audio and video tracks accurately

6. Implement creative visual elements to make the podcast engaging

7. Collaborate with the team to ensure the final product aligns with our vision and brand

8. Deliver final versions in a timely manner for weekly publication

9. Communicate regularly with the team via Slack channel during EST hours (8 AM - 3 PM)

Requirements:

1. Proven experience in podcast editing (audio and video)

2. Native English proficiency to understand and edit nuanced content accurately

3. Proficiency in editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Audacity, or similar)

4. Strong understanding of audio editing techniques and tools
Ability to create and incorporate graphic overlays

5. Experience in handling multi-camera setups and varying participant numbers

6. Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines consistently

7. Good communication skills and a collaborative mindset
Availability to communicate in the Slack channel during EST hours (8 AM - 3 PM)

Application Instructions:

Please provide the following with your application:

1. A brief cover letter explaining your relevant experience and why you're a good fit for this role.

2. Links to previous podcast episodes or video projects you've edited.

3. Your flat rate per 1 edited 30 minute audio and video podcast episode.

4. Your turn around time per 1 edited 30 minute audio and video podcast episode.

If you have a passion for podcasting and are looking for a reliable ongoing project, we'd love to hear from you.

Apply today and join our creative team!

item.title: Photographer and Videographer for Event Coverage in New York - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced photographer and videographer to document the Copernicus Olympiad event in New York City from July 14 to 18, 2024. The ideal candidates will have a keen eye for detail, a passion for storytelling through visuals, and the ability to capture both candid moments and formal shots that reflect the spirit and energy of the event.

Key Responsibilities:
-Capture high-quality photographs and videos of the event, including key moments, participants, speakers, and activities.
-Ensure comprehensive coverage of the event, from the opening ceremonies to the closing awards.
-Edit and deliver final photos and video footage in a timely manner, ensuring they meet the organization's quality standards.
-Collaborate with the event organizers to understand specific coverage needs and expectations.
-Provide direction and pose participants as needed for optimal shots.

Qualifications:
--Proven experience as a photographer and/or videographer, preferably with experience covering large events.
--Strong portfolio showcasing your photography and videography skills.
--Proficiency in photo and video editing software.
--Ability to work independently and manage your time effectively.
--Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
--Availability to be on-site in New York City from July 14 to 18, 2024.

Benefits:
Competitive compensation based on experience and portfolio.
Opportunity to be part of an exciting international event and work with a dynamic team.
Exposure to a global audience and potential for future opportunities with the Copernicus Olympiad.

Budget: $1,000

item.title: Product Review Video Creator (Amazon Video) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am Lradon from Andvids.We are a video production agency from China assisting our clients in finding  content creators to produce unboxing videos. You can not only get free products(beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.), but also commissions by doing this in your free time.

Here are some requirements for the shoot:
1. The length of the video is 1-3 minutes, of which 30% of the time is used for explanation, and 70% of the time is used to show the use scenario of the product
2. Shoot in landscape mode (16:9) ，your face need to be shown in video
3. A clean, bright shooting environment
4. Able to introduce products in fluent and clear English
5. Introduce the selling points and functions of the product, and use it in multiple scenarios.
6. Don't mention price, discount
7. In case of emergency, illness, move or vacation, please inform us in advance.
Do not show QR codes of packaging or products in the video, and do not mention personal information

About project time and delivery method
Please complete the shooting and edit within three days after receiving the product.
And name the video in this format: order number + product name + your name, and put the video Upload it to Google Drive, set the link permission to open and send it to me.
I will pay you after I review it.

Most importantly, we need the original video.
About copyright: After you agree to send the video to us, we have the right to use your likeness for promotional purposes, including but not limited to uploading the video to Amazon

Special case treatment：
  However, if you cannot complete the shooting on time after receiving the product, lose contact, do not shoot, you will be responsible for this, the solution is as follows (choose one):
1. Pay for the product.
2. Forward the product to the new address and bear the shipping cost.

Long-term cooperation：
  The first three videos are the experimental list.Of course I'll still give you a commission.
   After that, if the video effect is good and the communication between the two parties is smooth, long-term cooperation can be considered.

If you are interested in this job,feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently.Look forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 14, 2024 08:39 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Video Production, UGC, Product Review
Skills: Video Production, UGC, Product Review
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China

item.title: Indio, CA Social Media Videography (Real Estate) - Upwork
item.description:
I’m the marketing manager for the short-term rental interior design company, Somerled Designs. We have an upcoming project in Indio, CA. We will be shooting photo content of the property in the afternoon/evening of Thursday June 27th, and would like to hire a videographer to come out that day as well. Experience with social media content creation & real estate videography is preferred.

We are looking for a videographer who can capture social media content (vertical orientation) of the interior design, as well as some drone footage. Regarding deliverables, we're looking for the items outlined in this document:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1j4F83VvY57bv0_3Kq3Wn-84_TQxflPcKXtoEITEMhWw/edit?usp=sharing
^included in this document are links to our "inspiration" videos as a style benchmark

As you'll see the deliverables should require very little editing. We mostly want the clips outlined in the shot lists (edited w/ any necessary color correction) delivered separately, and 1 walkthrough video. We won't need you to compile full IG reels/TiktToks with this content—our internal team will handle that part.

The location is a 2,129 sqft home with 3 bedrooms, a living room, dining room, as well as a pool and other outdoor amenities in the backyard. Judging by similar shoots we've done in the past, I'd expect the filming time to take around 3-4 hours, depending on how quickly you work.

If you are interested in and available for this shoot on June 27th, I'd appreciate it if you could send over a couple of samples (social media videos preferably) that demonstrate your comfort-level with the style we're aiming for.

Budget: $600

item.title: Video Editor for Social Media Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We want to make video ads that will be used to promote our app on social media. We work with influencers directly to create the content, but need an experienced Video Editor to edit the videos and take them to the next level.

We’re looking for someone who’s detail oriented but also creative and can come up with original ideas to help us improve.

Here are the typical tasks you would work on:
1. Add sounds, cuts and interesting transitions to make our ads “scroll stoppers”
2. Add transitions to make it easier and clearer for users to understand what we do (ex overlay our app on top of the screen so users see what the app does while the influencer is talking)
3. In general, you will use Video Editing as a tool to make our ads more fun and engaging

Our goal is to make our ads insanely fun and entertaining so that users actually love watching them. People hate ads so this is a very high bar. But our ads will be different and more interesting and more shareable and you will help us get there!

If this sounds interesting to you please apply. And please send me few samples of past work you’ve done that showcases your video editing skills. Thanks!

Hourly Range: $75.00-$120.00

item.title: Manfacturing-Focused Video Content - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there!

I'm looking for someone to come to our manufacturing facility to help me get some great clips of our presses and pressman at work. We have just purchased a new press and would like to create a few videos showing its capabilities.

I will be onsite the whole time working through each shot with you since I don't have a clear plan on how its all going to be edited together yet. The goal is to get some great material that I can piece together and use in multiple settings such as on our website, socials, and any ad related functions.

Our plant is in Monroe, OH and I will need to have someone onsite ideally sometime between 6/24-6/27. I don't anticipate it should be more than a few hours of work taking the actual footage + how ever long it takes for editting.

If this sounds like something you'd like to work on, please send me a note!

item.title: UGC Content Creator (Talking on Camera) - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a talented UGC (User-Generated Content) creator who is comfortable talking on camera to create an engaging video for our brand. We already have the script for you and exactly what we want it to look like. You just need to come across as nice and have good energy on camera. The video will be around 40 seconds long and there will be many cuts to keep the audience engaged so it's not like you need to memorize anything more than a line or 2 for the script. You will be using a mix of your natural background and the greenscreen effect on your phone to show off our website as you talk about it.

    Skills required:
    - Proficient in video content creation
    - Strong on-camera presence
    - Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

    Size: Small
    Duration: 1 video (less than 45 seconds long)

If this goes well, we may have future projects for you as well.

Budget: $50

item.title: Versatile Graphic Designer with Light Video Editing Experience - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and versatile Graphic Designer with experience in basic video editing, (social media, making clips, etc.), to join our creative team. The ideal candidate will be a one-stop-shop for all our creative needs, capable of handling tasks from brand development to creating engaging on-brand content for marketing and social media.

Must be available between 10am and 5pm Eastern Time.
If you have a proven track record in graphic design, web design, print design, brand asset creation, and marketing, we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities:
Graphic Design: Create compelling visual content for various platforms, including digital and print media. Develop logos, media kits, and other brand assets.

Web Design: Design and maintain user-friendly websites that align with our brand's aesthetic and functionality requirements.
Print Design: Design marketing materials such as brochures, flyers, and posters that effectively communicate our brand message.
Video Editing: Light video editing including trimming videos for clips, graphic overlays, social media posts, etc.

Brand Development: Work on building and enhancing brands by creating brand assets following a cohesive brand strategy and visual identity.

Presentation Decks: Create engaging and professional presentation decks that help attract sponsors and investors.

Marketing Campaigns: Collaborate with the marketing and social media teams to create effective campaigns that drive brand awareness and sales.

Requirements:
Solid experience in graphic design and photo editing, with proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign.

Solid experience in website design and maintenance using Wordpress, elementor and related software and plugins including WooCommerce, Shopify and other integrations.

Light experience in video editing using Adobe Premiere, including creating clips, adding text overlays and creating social media posts.

Strong background in both web and print design.

Strong background in maximizing copy layout for impact.

Using AI tools to create graphics, video clips, photo editing, etc.

Experience in brand development and working with B2B and B2C.

Experience in brand asset creation, such as logos, brochures, and other related materials.

Ability to create engaging presentation decks for sponsors and investors that capture attention and communicate key messages effectively.

Excellent understanding of UI/UX principles and experience in developing user interfaces and experiences.

Strong project management skills, with the ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.

Exceptional creativity and innovation, with a keen eye for detail.

Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Work schedule must fall between 10am - 5pm ET US.

Preferred Skills:
Experience in animation and motion graphics.
Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for web development.
Familiarity with social media platforms and trends.
General copy editing skills for the purpose of creating engaging graphic design layouts.

What We Offer:
A dynamic and collaborative work environment.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.
Flexible work hours and remote work options.
Competitive compensation based on experience and skills.
Opportunity to work in the entertainment industry and receive IMDB credit.

If you are passionate about bringing creative visions to life and have the skills and experience we are looking for, please apply with your portfolio, and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience.
Please include your weekly rate based on a 20 hour week to start. We plan to start our hire with a 20 hour week moving up to full-time based on successful performance.

We look forward to seeing your creative work and exploring how you can contribute to our projects!


Posted On: June 13, 2024 16:52 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Print Design, Graphic Design, Website Asset, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Video Editing
Skills: Print Design, Graphic Design, Website Asset, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Video Editing

item.title: Tiktok / Instagram Content Creators Needed (Kitchen/ Baking) Product - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for Bread Bakers, Bakers or anyone who loves making authentic kitchen content!

We're hiring 5 more female female content creators ages 35+ with experience making authentic TikTok / instagram viral videos!

Your job will be to post 1-2  videos every day on our TikTok page and IG Page to increase our organic views and sales to our website.

Our product is a bread knife which we will ship to you so you can consistently make and upload videos to make a few videos go Viral

The position includes a $500 monthly Salary + 20% Commission bonus on all sales your videos Generate (This is over $8-10 per unit you sell!)

If you feel you'd be a good fit to join our team, please submit your proposal along with a link to your Instagram/TikTok page as we'd love to speak!

Thanks!
-Tobenna
